abstract: European Union reviews proposal from France requesting new sanctions on Iran over its recent missile tests, even as French government welcomes visit from Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani.
lead_paragraph: The country has asked its European Union partners to consider sanctions for Iran’s recent missile tests, even as the French welcomed President Hassan Rouhani of Iran for a visit.

headline.main: France: Proposal Is Raised for New Penalties on Iran
headline.print_headline: Europe; France: Proposal Is Raised for New Penalties on Iran

snippet: The country has asked its European Union partners to consider sanctions for Iran’s recent missile tests, even as the French welcomed President Hassan Rouhani of Iran for a visit.
